meanings.definition: Not relating to or characterized by harmony.
meanings.sent1: The nonharmonic colors clashed in the painting.
meanings.sent2: The nonharmonic relationship between the two countries led to tension.
meanings.sent3: The nonharmonic mix of flavors in the dish made it taste strange.
meanings.sent4: The nonharmonic blend of scents in the room was overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The nonharmonic combination of patterns in the design was jarring.

meanings.sent1: Their nonharmonic opinions caused a heated debate.
meanings.sent2: The nonharmonic decisions of the committee delayed progress.
meanings.sent3: The nonharmonic schedules of the team members caused confusion.
meanings.sent4: The nonharmonic voices in the choir disrupted the harmony.
meanings.sent5: The nonharmonic goals of the project led to inefficiency.

meanings.sent1: The nonharmonic notes clashed in the music piece.
meanings.sent2: The nonharmonic instruments created a discordant melody.
meanings.sent3: The nonharmonic sounds of the animals in the zoo amused the visitors.
meanings.sent4: The nonharmonic voices of the singers grated on the ears.
meanings.sent5: The nonharmonic tones of the piano made the audience cringe.
